title: BBC Local Live: Cumbria for Thursday 30 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: serious accident on m6 southbound near carlisle .
national park hopes to improve relationship with farmers .
entertainment venue bounces back from flooding .

documents.title: through the day : bbc cumbria live
text: our updates have come to an end today on bbc cumbria live .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 when we 'll be getting ready for the reopening of the settle-carlisle railway line .
today , .
we found out who will be on the panel for bbc question time in carlisle tonight .
the lake district national park talked about its plan to improve its relationship with farmers - a new farming officer .
and four people have been arrested in connection with an alleged knifepoint robbery in a carlisle park .
have a great evening .

documents.title: uncertainty for 20 staff at barrow construction firm amid takeover report
text: up to 20 people who work at a barrow construction firm fear they will lose their jobs after they turned up to work to discover it was closed .
author: North West Evening Mail
Newspaper

documents.title: big rise in bookings for flood fixed venue in north cumbria
text: a carlisle entertainments venue which had been open for just seven months before it flooded has seen a big increase in bookings since it reopened .
more than 8ft of water deluged the old fire station during storm desmond .
the venue reopened last september following nine months of drying out and improvement work .
since then , 126 events have been held there .
in 2015 , the figure was just 75 .

documents.title: sport : carlisle united without nicky adams at yeovil
text: carlisle united are looking to end a seven game run without a win when they face yeovil this weekend .
the blues will be without their influential midfielder nicky adams after he up a hamstring injury against crewe .
we need goals to come .
one of our most likely creative players is going to be out for a period of time with an injury .
but we 've got players coming back .
jason kennedy , jabo ibere , james bailey .
signing of two new players that are very hungry , have got different dynamics , a physical presence , an eye for a goal .
it gives us another opportunity .
author: BBC Radio Cumbria Sport

documents.title: bank of england asks about animal products in cumbria-made notes
text: a consultation 's started today into the use of animal products in polymer banknotes produced in cumbria .
the current polymer is made at innovia in wigton and contains traces of animal fat .
it 's used in the production of the current £ 5 note and will be used in the planned new £ 10 note .
however , the bank says it 's prepared to consider a suitable , plant based material for new £ 20 note and future reprints of the £ 5 and £ 10 notes .
the consultation ends at 23:00 on 12 may 2017 .
author: BBC Business News

documents.title: south cumbrian roller derby team finds new home
text: a roller derby team in south cumbria has found a new place to train in after years without a proper home .
roller derby is a full contact sport played on quad roller skates with players trying to score points by passing their opponents .
the furness firecrackers will now train at the ulverston tennis centre .
their first practice sessions at the centre start next week .

documents.title: weather : breezy , mild and cloudy
text: staying breezy , mild and mostly cloudy into the evening and overnight .
more rain over the hills with overnight lows of 11c ( 52f ) .
check the latest forecast for your area with bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: finding mobile phone 'vital ' in sex attack investigation
text: cumbria police believe that finding a mobile phone posted through a letterbox in whitehaven in january could be crucial for their investigation into a sexual assault .
it was reported in january that a 49-year-old woman had been sexually assaulted in the park at woodhouse road in whitehaven .
detectives are now trying to find a mobile phone that they think was posted through a letterbox in the woodhouse road or fleaswick avenue area around thursday 5 january 2017 .

documents.title: club 's new home : what is roller derby ?
text: we 've been telling you today about how after years of searching , the furness firecrackers roller derby team have finally found a base to train in .
here 's an explainer about the rules of the game , .
courtesy of bbc get inspired .
if you 're looking for a new sport or activity to get involved in , give the activity finder on the bbc sport website a try .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: four arrested in connection with knife point robbery in cumbrian park
text: cumbria police have arrested two men , aged 19 and 20 , on sus of robbery .
it follows a robbery in carlisle 's melbourne park on tuesday 28 march when it 's said two men holding knifes demanded a woman hand over her phone and handbag .
the two men remain in custody for questioning .
a woman aged 25 has been arrested on sus of assisting an offender while 17-year-old woman has been arrested on sus of perverting the course of justice .
both of the women have been bailed .
author: Lee Macaulay
Journalist, BBC Cumbria

documents.title: desperate appeal for coach to train footballers of the future
text: harraby catholic football club need more volunteers to help coach their under-sixes .
the club is entirely dependent on parents and volunteers .
coach andrew hewson worries that some children will have to play elsewhere if they do n't get the extra help .

documents.title: cumbria 's headlines this afternoon
text: here are the headlines from across bbc cumbria this afternoon :
author: Lee Macaulay
Journalist, BBC Cumbria

documents.title: cumbrian students in top 10 for national lego robot competition
text: a team of students from keswick school has made it into the top 10 schools in a national competition to build robots using lego .
they built and programmed the robot to follow a course and retrieve small objects .
first lego league designed to encourage children to follow a career in science and technology .
author: John Bowness
BBC Radio Cumbria reporter

documents.title: panel announced for bbc question time in cumbria
text: tonight , bbc question time comes from the sands centre in carlisle .
here 's the panel that will be answering questions from the live studio audience :
question time will be shown on bbc one tonight at 22:45 .
here 's thursday 's full # bbcqt panel in carlisle .
10.45pm on bbc one : @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid len mccluskey @ twitterid

showing her profound ignorance of scottish politics , culture and values .
3 of 6

6 of 6 conclusion 4me # indyref2
could pedley not find a proper mp to represent labour , not nandy a right-wing excuse for one ?
oh wait , i forgot , pedley only does right-wing
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid ukip have no mps !
yes but in world of @ twitterid he is an mp !
again , a party with no mps is on the panel .
why ?
ukip is 3rd largest party in terms of votes at ge 2015 .
should be on every week imo , as tories & labs are .
they have 0 westminster seats .
zero .
snp have 56 , libdems 8 , plaid cymru 3 , greens 1 .
ukip - none .
not one .
not a sausage .
that 's due to fptp .
and why should political guests need to be mps ?
nuttall is an mep & party leader

i 'd just expect ukip representation on # bbcqt to be proportionate to that party 's relevance .
it is n't .
third largest party with 3.9 m votes though .
that 's highly relevant ?
ok .
they should be allowed on to platforms such as # bbcqt on line with their 14 % share of the vote .
they 've been on 25 % of the time post-15 .
the only 2 parties that had a higher vote in the ge are on every week eh
# bbcqt ruth davidson always makes jokes when she does n't want to answer an uncomfortable question .
and hey i 'm theresa 's biggest fan .
1 of 6
who on this panel speaks then for the 48 % ?
# bbcqt lisa nandy i 'm fervently against my leader @ twitterid vexed eyebrow raises to show faux anxiety about corbyn .

why no liberal democrats representative .
the light blue tories had ruth davidson to represent them .
author: BBC One

documents.title: weather : breezy with outbreaks of rain
text: some outbreaks of heavy and persistent rain through the afternoon .
highs of 15c ( 59f ) .
author: Abbie Dewhurst
Weather Presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: travel : delays expected on a66 westbound because of abnormal loads
text: cumbria police are warning drivers to allow extra time for their journey if travelling westbound on the a66 in east cumbria .
two long , abnormal loads are travelling from darlington to aberdeen .
delays could be expected between 11:00 and 14:00 today before the vehicles join the m6 northbound towards scotland .
author: Lee Macaulay
Journalist, BBC Cumbria

documents.title: highways bosses apologise for 'bedlam in barrow ' as motorists hit by roadworks
text: motorists have criticised council bosses for the 'bedlam in barrow ' caused by three separate sets of roadworks on major roads in the town taking place simultaneously .
author: North West Evening Mail
Newspaper

documents.title: lake district national park hopes to improve fractured relationship with farmers
text: the lake district national park authority has told bbc cumbria that it 's not been open and honest in its dealings with farmers in the past .
now , the authority says it 's trying to improve its relationship with farmers by appointing a new farming officer who 'll work to protect the industry .
the uncertainty of the uk leaving the european union and the area 's bid to be a world heritage site will be two major issues for whoever gets the job .

documents.title: travel : delays on cumbrian coast line
text: there are delays of up to 60 minutes and some cancellations on northern services between whitehaven and sellafield due to safety checks of the signal box at st bees .
to report traffic and travel incidents dial .
0330 123 0184. at any time .

text: here 's the fells forecast for daylight hours today :
if you 're planning a walk on some of the county 's higher fells , do n't forget to plan ahead and check out the fell top assessors ' weather forecast first .

documents.title: weather : mild and breezy
text: a mild start to a breezy and cloudy day with outbreaks of rain that could be heavy over higher ground .
highs today of 15c .

author: Abbie Dewhurst
Weather Presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: man jailed for 'shocking ' ear-bite attack
text: man jailed for 'shocking ' ear-bite attack

documents.title: breakingsliproad reopens after car goes down embankment from m6
text: a car has left the m6 and gone down an embankment near carlisle , according to cumbria police .
the emergency services are on the scene at the j42 ( carlisle south ) southbound sliproad .
officers tell bbc cumbria that a silver toyota left the motorway at about 06:45 .
there was one man inside the car and the extent of his injuries are not yet known .
the sliproad has now been reopened .
author: Steven Bell
BBC Cumbria

documents.title: fire service at serious accident on m6 says highways england
text: # m6 j42 ( # carlisle/a6 ) southbound entry slip is closed due to a serious collision @ twitterid attending .
please plan ahead .
